title: Post your best League of Legends meme here
body:
I'm looking for the best League of Legends memes out there. These need to be funny or generate cool conversations/scenarios.

E.g.
http://i.imgur.com/RRRYWlS.jpg

Remember you can embed pictures from the web by pasting the image URL right into the comment or you can attach a picture from your computer!

replies.body: http://memestorage.com/_nw/80/85048659.jpg
Lol, i don't know why but I want to rub butter on his face for some reason.
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/bttf/images/b/bb/Back_to_the_Future_Textless_Poster.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150928162006
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/302/930/3be.jpg
This one is soooo goood
Why do you guys ignore the rads error problem??
What's  that please? I keep getting a LoL has lost connection with maestro something something error sometimes.
The goo...bad ole days. Beware kind strangers who may try to drug your consumables or lure you into isolated areas!
Muahahahahaha xD
I usually have them more spaced out though and I usually only use 2-3 if the match is kind of desperate.

https://hummingbird-forum.s3.amazonaws.com/5073ff4de2e9deff68e54f7725a7e9663025c69dbba2.jpg
my favourite
So sad but true.
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/e0/e076f2c3c62b227b285470e81880fb03f479adf3097c550ee19cbd2177845491.jpg
Lol is that guy a kiwi a boxer???
To all LoL player/non player ever in their promo/not in their promo,
That picture calmed me down after meeting a duo that fed. Even after reading the text, I'm still calm...maybe because I'm so lonely  and thinking that chick's talking to me. :l Oh sheit.

I made my first meme!
How I feel every time I do it.
I made another!
Good one lol
Lol, I  don't. I make a straight line back to my lane because of brutal invades xD
That's trolling.....or a good kill denial.
ye
LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL.
Do it for her, Rito

Pffffffft some people have butter/pumpkin faces by stereotypical standards but they still have nice bods/minds. The first time I saw that skin display, it creeped me out because she reminded me of those possessed dolls from horror movies or people who don't talk back and just keep staring at you placidly.

Annie's scarier  than Thresh :l A little girl that can kill a bear then bring it back to life engulfed in fire? All Thresh does is leech on souls and suffering. Lol stil a nice picture though, kind of like a kindergarten poster or something.
I cri erytim
No joke
Sad.
Lol, when somebody's typed out 3 sentences to blame you and your like..."You didn't' even wait for me."
lol
Golem on golem action :llllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllll
lvl 0 to silver 5 -.- or people are just  so greedy for kills it just looks like they don't know when to do things.
Seriously guys, why haven't I seen this yet?
#10/10 #brainexercise #huntingothersbutinagame #http://bebrainfit.com/why-human-brains-have-gotten-smaller/ #bored #randomstuff #notreally #justsharing
i think people seen this but XD so classic

I can only assume it is the Google.
Lol. Alistar. Rick Grimes as  a minotaur would be badass. I wonder what Alistar would look like if he was human.
Well it was mordekaiser so if i die he can just raise me to  be his ghostly servant #Immortal
